name: Rainbow Wishstick
description:
The Original Wishstick, For Interior or exterior display.

Making a wish with a wishstick is certainly not a guarantee. But if your wish doesn't come true at least you are left with a fantastic piece of handmade glass art.

Shipped in one of our specially made tubes!

50cm long

New lower price!

name: Cornish Pilchard Bowl. 14cm, 22cm, 30cm
description:
These fish are handcrafted, fused in bubbly blue enamels and baked at very special temperatures in our Cornish kilns.
Jo's latest range, 'Cornish Pilchards' is the latest range from her successful Launceston studios. Already creating quite a stir in our seaside galleries, these fresh and lively products play on the fashionable 'nautical' design theme.

*14cm Bowl is shown. Scale and design may differ slightly on larger dishes*

name: Double Arc Gift Sets - Choice of Colours
description: The New Jo Downs Arc gift sets come complete with Lemongrass and Bergamot Hand Wash and Hand Cream that was specially made for us from naturally sourced ingredients just down the road in Bodmin. Click here to see colour choices and then choose below. The Jo Downs Arc is the must-have kitchen and bathroom accessory. Originally developed for a leading soap manufacturer, our Arcs can be used to house a variety of quality hand-creams, soaps and lotions. Alternatively, store your oils and vinegars in style with Jo's beautifully-designed masterpiece. Available in single and double designs, the Arc comes in a variety of eye-catching colour-ways. Delivery of Arcs may take a little longer as they are made to order 20cm x 10cm

description: The New Jo Downs single Arc gift sets come complete with Lemongrass and Bergamot Hand Wash and that was specially made for us from naturally sourced ingredients just down the road in Bodmin. Originally developed for a leading soap manufacturer, our Arcs can be used to house a variety of quality hand-creams, soaps and lotions. name: Spring Stripe Soap Dish
description:
Perfect for any bathroom, Jo's Soap Dishes can be teamed up with one of our arcs or they look great on their own.

Jo hand-picked the wonderful lavender and lemongrass scented soap that has been especially made for our dishes.

*Available with or without soap*

13cm x 7cm
